info.title: OnDemand API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the OnDemand Platform

post.summary: Send OTP to user or provider
post.description: Creates a user if phone+role does not exist and sends OTP.

message.example: Something went wrong while sending OTP.

post.summary: Verify OTP for user or provider login
post.description: Verify sent OTP and return access token

message.example: Something went wrong during OTP verification.

post.summary: Register a new user or provider
post.description: Registers a user or provider and optionally uploads KYC document

kyc_document.description: KYC document file (pdf, jpg, png, jpeg)

get.description: Returns the profile details of the authenticated user

post.summary: Update profile image of logged-in user

profile_image.description: Profile image file (jpeg, png, jpg, webp)

post.summary: Add new address for authenticated user
post.description: Allows only users (role=user) to add an address
Revokes the current access token of the logged-in user

get.summary: Get paginated list of sub-category items

description.example: Fix all types of plumbing issues

post.summary: Add a service item to the user's cart

services_id.description: ID of the service to add to cart

post.summary: Increase quantity of an item in the cart

403.description: Unauthorized  item does not belong to user

cart_id.description: Cart ID belonging to the logged-in user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the booking to update

get.summary: Get current and completed jobs for the logged-in provider

403.description: Unauthorized  user is not a provider

user_id.description: ID of the user to rate

booking_id.description: ID of the booking associated with the review

403.description: Unauthorized  user is not a provider

get.summary: Get all service parts grouped by category

post.summary: Create a cost estimation for a booking
Update the status of a cost estimation

message.example: Failed to update the status from user side

provider_id.description: ID of the provider to rate

booking_id.description: Booking ID associated with the provider

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter transactions by type: cash_in or cash_out

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Filter transactions by date range, e.g., 30days

get.summary: Get all conversations for the authenticated user

text.example: Hello, your service is on the way!

get.summary: Get messages for a specific booking

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: Booking ID to fetch messages for

post.summary: Send a message in a booking conversation

404.description: Booking not found or not authorized
